channel.title: North Korea on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in North Korea on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Leak Reveals the Workaday Lives of North Korean IT Scammers
item.description: Spreadsheets, Slack messages, and files linked to an alleged group of North Korean IT workers expose their meticulous job-planning and targeting—and the constant surveillance they’re under.

item.title: North Korean hackers ran US-based “laptop farm” from Arizona woman’s home
item.description: North Korea made millions from the scheme.
